title: Agent Browser Dev
description: Fork of vercel-labs/agent-browser with TypeScript patches and A0 integration
instructions: This is the agent-browser development project. Fork of vercel-labs/agent-browser (upstream: main). TypeScript patches + A0 integration files on emichi branch. Build: npm install --ignore-scripts && npx tsc. Deploy to emichi with: bash deploy.sh <target_a0_dir>
